name: Hey, Jackpot for the Taking
simple_desc: Has a high chance to decrease one enemy and adjacent targets' DMG dealt, and increase Cipher's ATK. At the same time, deals Quantum DMG to one designated enemy and minor Quantum DMG to adjacent targets.
desc: There is a #6[i]% base chance to Weaken one designated enemy and adjacent targets, decreasing their DMG dealt by #3[i]% and increasing Cipher's ATK by #5[i]%, lasting for #4[i] turn(s). At the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Cipher's ATK to one designated enemy, and Quantum DMG equal to #2[i]% of Cipher's ATK to its adjacent targets.
